title: Chilli con Carne
image: http://www.schwartz.co.uk/~/media/Recipe Photos/Schwartz/Beef/Chilli con Carne from Scratch.ashx
directions: Heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the onion, over a medium-heat, until softened. Stir in the Ground Cumin, Ground Coriander, Oregano and Bay Leaf. Cook for 1 minute to release the flavours.
Add the beef mince and brown for about 4-5 minutes. Drain excess oil if necessary. Add the Paprika, tomato pur√©e and Crushed Chillies.

Stir in the chopped tomatoes, beef stock and kidney beans. Turn up the heat for 1 minute, then reduce the heat and simmer for around 10 minutes until the sauce has thickened and the mince is cooked. Season to taste.
Stir in the chocolate and gently heat through, ensuring that sauce does not boil. Finally, stir in the Coriander Leaf and serve.
Delicious served with rice and green salad.
